title: License required
context: [ยง465D-4] License required. (a) Beginning on January 1, 2016, except as specifically provided in this chapter, no person shall engage in the practice of behavior analysis or use the title &ldquo;licensed behavior analyst&rdquo; or &ldquo;behavior analyst&rdquo; without a valid license issued pursuant to this chapter. (b) Any person who violates this section shall be subject to a fine of not more than $1,000 for each separate offense. Each day of each violation shall constitute a separate offense. [L 2015, c 199, pt of ยง2]
